quoteText:
Brainly uses a third-party payment processor, currently Zuora (https://www.zuora.com/), to process subscription payments.
Please see Zuora’s privacy statement available on its site for information on how Zuora collects and uses personal information.
title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "Brainly uses a third-party payment processor, currently Zuora (https://www.zuora.com/), to process subscription payments. Please see Zuora’s privacy statement available on its site for information on how Zuora collects and uses personal information."
